meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Provisions</kanji> that are only for <kanji>soldier</kanji>s are <vocabulary>army provisions</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You learned the reading for the second kanji but not the first one yet. Here's a mnemonic to help you:

The army said it would provide you with some <vocabulary>army provisions</vocabulary>. That's great! You go to the drop site where the provisions are, and you see the provisions. "<reading>Heyo!</reading> It's <reading>roe</reading>!" (ひょうろう) you say out loud. You're pretty happy that your provisions consist of tons and tons of roe!
